rows.label: qst200207_msg0002
rows.name:
What's this all of a sudden?
Who are you, anyway?

rows.label: qst200207_msg0003
rows.name:
Don't worry, madam, we're just
looking to ask a few questions.

rows.label: qst200207_msg0004
rows.name:
Hmph. Still sounds plenty
suspicious to me.

rows.label: qst200207_msg0005
rows.name:
If you're debt collectors, you're
barking up the wrong tree.
We don't have any money to pay!

rows.label: qst200207_msg0006
rows.name:
Unless you want to kill me and
take my whole damn house!

rows.label: qst200207_msg0007
rows.name:
That's not what we're here for.
We just wanted you to tell us a
little about Harghal.

rows.label: qst200207_msg0008
rows.name:
Hah! Why should I care about
that hussy of a daughter?

rows.label: qst200207_msg0010
rows.name:
She just ups and does whatever she
pleases, never a thought for her old
mother's worries!

rows.label: qst200207_msg0011
rows.name:
Isn't it your daughter you're
really worried about?

rows.label: qst200207_msg0013
rows.name:
What does a stranger like you
know about our troubles?!
